Sentencas: Microtubular solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs) are shown to be robust under rapid temperature changes and have large electrode area per volume (high volumetric power density).
Titulo: Simulation Study for the Optimization of Microtubular Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Bundles

Sentencas: Such features are believed to increase a variety of application.
Titulo: Simulation Study for the Optimization of Microtubular Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Bundles

Sentencas: Our study aims to establish a fabrication technique for microtubular SOFC bundles with the volumetric power density of 2 W cm(-3) at 0.7 V.
Titulo: Simulation Study for the Optimization of Microtubular Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Bundles

Sentencas: So far, we have succeeded to develop a fabrication technology for microtubular SOFC bundles using anode supported tubular SOFCs and cathode matrices with well-controlled microstructures.
Titulo: Simulation Study for the Optimization of Microtubular Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Bundles

Sentencas: A key to improve the performance of the microtubular SOFC bundles is to optimize the microstructure of the cathode matrices because it influences a pressure loss for air and electric current collection.
Titulo: Simulation Study for the Optimization of Microtubular Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Bundles

Sentencas: In this paper, a simulation study of an air flow, temperature, and potential distributions in the microtubular SOFC bundle was conducted in order to understand the characteristics of the present bundle design.
Titulo: Simulation Study for the Optimization of Microtubular Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Bundles

Sentencas: In addition, operating conditions of the microtubular SOFC bundles was discussed for realizing the target power density of 2 W cm(-3).
Titulo: Simulation Study for the Optimization of Microtubular Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Bundles
Simulation Study for the Optimization of Microtubular Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Bundles
